articles.title: Arizona Coyotes, Tempe to move forward on arena talks - ESPN
articles.description: The Arizona Coyotes and the city of Tempe will move forward on negotiations on a new arena and entertainment district, after the city council's 5-2 vote in favor of the bid on Thursday night.
articles.content:
